provider_arguments.info: account_key - (Required) The Logentries account key. This can also be specified with the LOGENTRIES_ACCOUNT_KEY environment variable. See the Logentries account key documentation for more information.

arguments.info: logset_id - (Required) The id of the logentries_logset resource.
name - (Required) The name of the log. The name should be short and descriptive. For example, Apache Access, Hadoop Namenode.
retention_period - (Optional, default ACCOUNT_DEFAULT) The retention period (1W, 2W, 1M, 2M, 6M, 1Y, 2Y, UNLIMITED, ACCOUNT_DEFAULT)
source - (Optional, default token) The log source (token, syslog, agent, api). Review the Logentries log inputs documentation for more information.
name - (Required) The log set name, which should be short and descriptive. For example, www, db1.
